snippet: CARTER--Pauline. Happy 100th Birthday. We can still hear you saying "Stay out of the refrigerator" and "Don't eat the cake...it's for company." You were a wonderful mother. Loved and missed by your sons Donny, Danny and Larry. 1/3
lead_paragraph: CARTER--Pauline. Happy 100th Birthday. We can still hear you saying "Stay out of the refrigerator" and "Don't eat the cake...it's for company." You were a wonderful mother. Loved and missed by your sons Donny, Danny and Larry. 1/3
